      public void doWrite() throws java.io.IOException

    • queueMessage

      void queueMessage​(java.nio.ByteBuffer bb)

      Parameters:
      bb -

    • updateInterestOps

      void updateInterestOps()
      Update the interestOps of the key looking only at values of the boolean closed and of both ByteBuffers. The convention is that both buffers are in write-mode before the call to updateInterestOps and after the call. Also it is assumed that process has been be called just before updateInterestOps.

    • doConnect

      public void doConnect() throws java.io.IOException
      set key to write if the socket channel is connected
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
